entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High 7. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 60 percent chance of freezing rain or ice pellets overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to periods of rain near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
